sentence.Network_en: Ethnic Composition: Hutu ( Buntu ) - 85 %; Tutsi ( Hamitic ) - 14 % ; Twa ( Pygmy ) －1 %. There is also about 5,000 Europeans and South Asians.
sentence.Network_cn: 民族: 胡图族 占 85%, 图西族占14%,特瓦族占1%, 另有5000名欧洲人和南亚人.

sentence.Network_en: Language: the official language is Arabic. Nubian, Nilo - Hamitic, Sudanic language and English are also spoken.
sentence.Network_cn: 语言: 阿拉伯语是官方语言, 努比亚语, 尼罗-哈米特语 、 苏丹语以及英语也是常用语言.

sentence.Network_en: About 95 % of Tanzanians are classified as Bantu , a blend of hamitic and negroid stocks.
sentence.Network_cn: 95%的坦桑尼亚人属于含米特人和黑人混血的班图人.
